summary.span: 表示文档级 Excel 项目中的一个工作表，这些项目通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Represents a worksheet in document-level Excel projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个表示图表工作表; 即，只包含一个图表工作表。A represents a chart sheet; that is, a worksheet that contains only a chart. 如果你想要创建嵌入的图表中的工作表还包含其他项，例如单元或其他控件，创建相反。If you want to create an embedded chart in a worksheet that also contains other items, such as cells or other controls, create a instead. 一个提供了与图表相关的所有功能本机Excel 对象模型中的对象。A provides all the chart-related features of a native object in the Excel object model. 但是，还公开了事件。However, a also exposes events. 您可以创建仅在设计时的文档级项目中的对象。You can create objects only in a document-level project at design time. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void ApplyLayout (int Layout, object ChartType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyLayout(int32 Layout, object ChartType) cil managed

param.name: Layout
param.span: 1 到 10 之间的一个整数，用于指定要应用于图表的布局的类型。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 10 that specifies the type of layout to apply to the chart.

summary.span: 将指定的布局应用于图表。

span.span: Applies the specified layout to the chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`Layout`上的参数对应于可用的选项**图表布局**组**设计**功能区上的选项卡。The values of the `Layout` parameter correspond to the available options on the **Chart Layouts** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon. **设计**时您选择一个图表，选项卡才可用。The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart. 图表的每个类型都有其自己的布局选项集。Each type of chart has its own set of layout options. 例如，饼图的布局选项是不同于柱形图的布局选项。For example, the layout options for a pie chart are different from the layout options for a column chart. 如果你想要从不同的图表类型来应用布局，则可以使用`ChartType`参数来指定图表键入`Layout`参数引用。If you want to apply a layout from a different chart type, you can use the `ChartType` parameter to specify the chart type that the `Layout` parameter will refer to. 例如，如果有一个柱形图和你想要从折线图应用布局，则传递值设为`ChartType`参数。For example, if you have a column chart and you want to apply a layout from a line chart, pass the value to the `ChartType` parameter. 布局仅添加适用于该特定图表类型的图表元素。The layout only adds chart elements that are available for that particular chart type. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例应用适用于图表工作表中的图表的图表类型的第十个布局`Chart1`。The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the chart in chart sheet `Chart1`. 此外，该示例使用方法应用更多布局更改： 将图表标题为居中且位于图表网格区域内的样式设置、 添加水平轴的标题以及添加垂直轴的旋转的标题。In addition, the example uses the method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis. 若要运行此代码示例，您的工作簿必须包含聚集的列二维图表工作表名为`Chart1`。To run this code example, your workbook must contain a clustered column two-dimensional chart sheet named `Chart1`. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_Additional#18](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/trin_excelworkbook_additional/cs/ThisWorkbook.cs#18)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_Additional#18](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/trin_excelworkbook_additional/vb/ThisWorkbook.vb#18)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Excel 才提供此功能的外接程序安装。You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Excel only after you install an add-in that provides this feature. 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持其他文件格式，如 PDF 和 XPS"Office Online 上。For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将保存图表工作表中的一页`Chart1`以 PDF 格式保存到指定的文件路径和文件名使用标准质量解析。The following code example saves one page of chart sheet `Chart1` in PDF format to the specified file path and file name using the standard quality resolution. 生成的 PDF 文件包含工作簿属性。The generated PDF file includes the workbook properties. 若要运行此代码示例，您的工作簿必须包含名为图表工作表`Chart1`。To run this code example, your workbook must contain a chart sheet named `Chart1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来修改指定的选项根据图表元素`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType`值。Use the method to modify an element of the chart according to the options specified by the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType` values. 例如，若要隐藏表格图例，请将传递值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone`到方法。For example, to hide the table legend, pass the value `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone` to the method. 可以使用此方法执行的操作对应于以下按钮上**布局**选中图表后，功能区选项卡：The operations you can perform by using this method correspond to the following buttons on the **Layout** tab of the Ribbon when a chart is selected: - 中的所有按钮**标签**组。All buttons in the **Labels** group. - 中的所有按钮**轴**组。All buttons in the **Axes** group. - 中的所有按钮**分析**组。All buttons in the **Analysis** group. - **绘图区**，**图表墙面**，并**图表地面**中的按钮**后台**组。The **Plot Area**, **Chart Wall**, and **Chart Floor** buttons in the **Background** group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例应用适用于图表工作表中的图表的图表类型的第十个布局`Chart1`。The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the chart in chart sheet `Chart1`. 此外，该示例使用方法应用更多布局更改： 将图表标题为居中且位于图表网格区域内的样式设置、 添加水平轴的标题以及添加垂直轴的旋转的标题。In addition, the example uses the method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis. 若要运行此代码示例，您的工作簿必须包含聚集的列二维图表工作表名为`Chart1`。To run this code example, your workbook must contain a clustered column two-dimensional chart sheet named `Chart1`.
